attributes.action: Make Rishi Sunak to resign. I believe that the PM of the UK needs to resign
attributes.additional_details: Becases he is making pointless laws, and we need a new government!
attributes.background: I believe that Rishi Sunak should resign as the PM, Because he is making useless laws, for example, trying to change the school system, but it has been working perfectly fine, and the fact he banned the XL bully and they need a lead a muzzle in public, and so many more reasons. Get rid of Sunak!!!

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for the Prime Minisiter to be removed.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Call an immediate general election: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/641904

We can also only accept petitions from people who provide their full name.
